T02D3454:110b-1: badzra aa nam ga manydzu shri s'a dha nam /
T02D3454:110b-3: 'jam dpal yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3454:110b-4: dpal ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3454:110b-5: sngon ma bzhin du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D3454:110b-7: de nas ham yig las skyes pa'i ham yig mnan
T02D3454:110b-8: pa'i lte ba'i dbus su mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu
T02D3454:110b-9: bsgoms nas de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D3454:110b-10: 'phags pa 'jam dpal yan lag med pa'i rdo rje sku mdog ser po phyag drug pa /
T02D3454:110b-11: rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis autpal dmar po'i mde'u dang
T02D3454:110b-12: bcas pa'i mda' bkang ba dang me tog gi gzhu
T02D3454:110b-13: bsnams pa / g-yas pa gnyis kyis ral gri dang /
T02D3454:110b-15: g-yon pa gnyis kyis autpal dmar po dang /
T02D3454:110b-16: mya ngan med kyi me tog dang bcas pa'i yal ga bsnams pa'o //
T02D3454:110b-17: mi bskyod pa dang ral pa'i cod pan gyis dbu la brgyan pa /
T02D3454:110b-19: lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu shin tu sgeg pa'i gzugs su blta'o ;
T02D3454:110b-20: / yang na phyag bzhi pa me long dang /
T02D3454:110b-21: mya ngan med pa'i yal ga 'dzin pa'i phyag gnyis dang bral ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3454:110b-22: de nas ye shes sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu byas te /
T02D3454:110b-23: aom manydzu ghosha hr'i:dza:zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3454:110b-24: 'bum bzlas na 'jig rten gsum po yang mngag gzhug pa byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3454:110b-25: yang na 'ga' zhig dgug par 'dod pas de'i tshe
T02D3454:110b-26: de nas gsungs pa bzhin du bsgom par byas nas
T02D3454:110b-27: de'i nga rgyal brtan po byas nas yid kyis rang
T02D3454:110b-28: gi snying gar padma dmar po 'dab ma bcu drug
T02D3454:110b-29: pa mngon par 'phyang pa'i sdong bu dang bcas pa
T02D3454:110b-30: dmigs nas de'i sdong bu'i rtsa bar yi ge h'um
T02D3454:111a-1: de'i 'dab ma rnams la g-yas skor du dbyangs yig
T02D3454:111a-2: dmar po bcu drug bsgom par byas nas de'i ze'u
T02D3454:111a-3: 'bru'i steng du nyin mo dang nub mo ji ltar
T02D3454:111a-4: byung ba'i nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi dkyil
T02D3454:111a-5: 'khor dmar po'o // de'i dbus su hr'i:yig dmar po
T02D3454:111a-6: gnyis kyi bar du brten pa'i 'chad par 'gyur ba'i
T02D3454:111a-7: rang gi sngags blta bar bya'o //
T02D3454:111a-8: de nas dbyangs yig dmar po de rnams la sbrang
T02D3454:111a-9: ma dga' ba rgyas pa dag bsgoms nas rang gi
T02D3454:111a-10: sngags kyi 'od zer gyi tshogs bcug ste /
T02D3454:111a-11: de snyed mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med kyi gnas
T02D3454:111a-12: su song nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D3454:111a-14: /'od zer gyi rang bzhin gyi zhags pas mgul nas legs par bcings te /
T02D3454:111a-15: lcags kyu brtan pos chos 'byung phug nas mdun du
T02D3454:111a-16: yang dag par bkug ste thal mo sbyar zhing mgal
T02D3454:111a-17: me'i 'khor lo'i tshul du 'khor ba'i nang du bcug
T02D3454:111a-18: nas h'um yig dmar pos mig dang snying ga dang
T02D3454:111a-19: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad gang bar bsgom
T02D3454:111a-20: par bya'o // de nas de'i snying gar yang dbyangs
T02D3454:111a-21: yig dmar po bcu drug dang bcas shing sdong bu
T02D3454:111a-22: la h'um yig dang bcas pa'i chu skyes 'dab ma
T02D3454:111a-23: bcu drug pa blta bar bya'o //
T02D3454:111a-24: 'on kyang dri ma dang bcas pa'i kha dog can no //
T02D3454:111a-25: de'i dbus su hr'i:yig gis brten pa'i ming gi yi ge bsam par bya'o //
T02D3454:111a-26: de nas rang gi sngags kyi yi ge'i 'od zer
T02D3454:111a-27: las byung ba'i shin tu dmar zhing phra ba'i lcags
T02D3454:111a-28: kyu rnon pos padma'i sdong bu la gnas pa'i yi
T02D3454:111a-29: ge h'um gi 'od zer gyis steng du 'gro zhing
T02D3454:111a-30: bskul nas sbrang rtsi byed pa'i tshogs kyi rjes su
T02D3454:111a-31: 'gro ba dang ldan pas rang gis na bug g-yas
T02D3454:111a-32: pa nas cig shos su zhugs shing 'thon nas bsgrub
T02D3454:111a-33: bya'i sna bug g-yas pa nas zhugs nas de'i snying
T02D3454:111a-34: gar zhugs te / lcags kyus de'i ming gi yi
T02D3454:111a-35: ge la gnas pa 'gugs par byed cing sbrang 'thung
T02D3454:111a-36: de rnams kyis kyang dga' bas padma de las byung
T02D3454:111a-37: zhing rang dbang gis de'i dbyangs rnams 'jib cing rnam
T02D3454:111a-38: par rnyings par byed do zhes shin tu yun ring
T02D3454:111a-39: du mi g-yo bar blta bar bya'o //
T02D3454:111a-40: de nas de kho na bzhin du dbugs kyis bskul ba'i lcags kyu de'i ming stobs kyis blangs te /
T02D3454:111a-41: sbrang bu de rnams kyis kyang rang gi dbyangs yig
T02D3454:111a-42: de'i sna bug g-yon pa'i lam du zhugs shing 'thon
T02D3454:111b-0: yang blangs te dbugs @111b kyi rlung gis lcags kyus sbrang ma rnams yang dag par bkug ste /
T02D3454:111b-1: rang gi sna bug g-yas pa'i sgo nas zhugs te /
T02D3454:111b-2: de'i ming gi yi ge rang gi snying ga'i sngags kyis drag tu mnan nas /
T02D3454:111b-3: dbyangs rnams 'dab ma so so la sbrang bu mchog
T02D3454:111b-4: gis dbang du byas par rnam par bsam par bya'o
T02D3454:111b-5: zhes pa 'di'i rim pas rang gi rnam par shes
T02D3454:111b-6: pa dang / de'i rnam par shes pa gcig tu blta bar bya'o //
T02D3454:111b-7: de nas de'i nu ma autpa la dmar po'i mde'u
T02D3454:111b-8: rnon po dang ldan pa'i mdzas phug nas 'dod chags
T02D3454:111b-10: 'gyel bar blta zhing lcags sgrog lta bu'i rgyud kyis de'i rkang pa gnyis dam por bcings nas /
T02D3454:111b-11: rang gis bzung ba'i autpa la'i sdong bu'i rang bzhin
T02D3454:111b-12: gyi zhags pas mgul nas bcings te yang dag par
T02D3454:111b-13: bkug nas rang gi rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du
T02D3454:111b-14: lhung bar byas nas mya ngan med pas snying gar
T02D3454:111b-15: bsnun cing mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par byas nas
T02D3454:111b-16: ral gris 'jigs par byas shing skyabs gzhan med par
T02D3454:111b-17: byas te ; yang me long gi bdag nyid ji
T02D3454:111b-18: ltar gnas pa skra grol zhing gcer bu shin tu
T02D3454:111b-19: chags pas myos shing bral bas 'jigs pa shin tu
T02D3454:111b-21: rang rig pas rjes su chags par bya'o //
T02D3454:111b-22: aom che ge mo a'a karsha ya manydzu gho sha
T02D3454:111b-23: hr'i:dza:zhes pa'i rang gi sngags ming dang bcas pa rtse
T02D3454:111b-24: gcig pa'i sems kyis bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3454:111b-25: de nas gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas dkar po'i
T02D3454:111b-26: mchog gi tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid tshes
T02D3454:111b-27: bcu bzhi'i bar du khri phrag gcig tsam bzlas par
T02D3454:111b-28: bya'o // yang tshes bco lnga la mchod pa rnam
T02D3454:111b-29: pa rgya chen po byas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas
T02D3454:111b-30: bya'o // par bya'o ; / de nas tho rangs nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3454:111b-31: 'ongs pa na de la yang phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D3454:111b-32: dngos grub kyi don du rang gi lha rnams mchod
T02D3454:111b-33: pa'i bsam pas ji ltar bde bar longs spyad par
